packets.name: Pilot Helmet AM2000 Mint
packets.author: Alotta-Money
packets.description:
The Pilot Helmet AM 2000 Mint,Goggle REEE Visor provides head protection against sharp object penetration
while redistributing the force of impact over a large region. This helmet is individually crafted in LARP™
and comes standard with a GFY™ foam custom liner.
